name: Time Loop
description:
Time Loop is a 2D platformer with hardcore elements, dynamic gameplay and nice graphics. In this game you need to pass a variety of levels and avoid enemies.
This is a linear and very interesting platformer in which you will have to go through a variety of levels and try to avoid enemies.With each new level you will come across more enemies and various dangers. Think over your every step, avoid the trap and do everything that will help you successfully complete your task.After all, if you make a mistake, you will have to start over!

KEY FEATURES:

- Hardcore gameplay
- Nice graphics
- Relaxing soundtrack
- An unforgettable experience
